translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Pairs of Doctrinal Terms

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati  hetu paccayā āsavañca ca iva sa āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na anāsavaḥ
translated: With an effluent and with what is affected by effluents as condition there arises what is not an effluent and not affected by effluents.🔽With an effluent and with what is affected by effluents as condition there arises what is not affected by effluents but is an effluent.

original: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca iva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an effluent and with what is affected by effluents as condition there arise what is not an effluent and not affected by effluents and what is not affected by effluents but is an effluent.🔽With what is affected by effluents but is not an effluent as condition there arises what is not an effluent but is affected by effluents. … three triplets.

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavañca sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an effluent and with what is affected by effluents and with what is affected by effluents but is not an effluent as condition there arises what is not an effluent and not affected by effluents. … three triplets.

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
